BusinessVitalityAgent.description: Top-level agent that handles business vitality tasks by delegating to sub-agents.

VitalityForecaster.description: Analyzes data to forecast business growth, trends, and future performance indicators.

AnomalyScanner.description: Detects unusual patterns, outliers, or anomalies in business metrics or datasets.

SalesAgent.description: Detects all the sales from the dataset and response.

{{input}}
